note: Improved sanitation facilities include flush/pour flush (to piped sewer system, septic tank, pit latrine), ventilated improved pit (VIP) latrine, pit latrine with slab, and composting toilet.
title: Share of population with improved sanitation vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: Improved sanitation facilities are likely to ensure hygienic separation of human excreta from human contact. GDP per capita is measured in constant international-$.
